meanings: [명사] advice, recommendation; (제안) suggestion, [동사] advise (sb to do / sb against sth), recommend
at the urging of a friend

vlive.korean: 헤어지시기를 강력하게 권고드립니다. I recommend you to break up with him. 듣기 View video 10PM : 양재진, 딘딘의 비정상담소 unusual counseling center
vlive.english: I recommend you to break up with him.

examples.korean: Farmers are being encouraged to diversify into new crops. 발음듣기 농부들은 새로운 작물들로 다양화를 꾀하라는 권고를 듣고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Farmers are being encouraged to diversify into new crops. 발음

examples.korean: Do not exceed the recommended dosage. 발음듣기 권고[규정]된 복용량을 초과하지 마시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do not exceed the recommended dosage. 발음

examples.korean: The report recommended a 10% pay increase. 발음듣기 그 보고서에서는 10%의 임금 인상을 권고했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The report recommended a 10% pay increase. 발음

examples.korean: These recommendations can safely be ignored. 발음듣기 이들 권고 사항들은 무시해도 무방하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These recommendations can safely be ignored. 발음

examples.korean: The recommendations will soon be put into effect. 발음듣기 그 권고 조항들은 곧 시행될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The recommendations will soon be put into effect. 발음
